mapper.select:
select count(distinct djt.`id`) from deploy_job_trigger djt left join deploy_job_trigger_app_module djtam on djt.id = djtam.trigger_id LEFT JOIN @{DATA_SCHEMA}.scence_appsystem_appmodule AS saa ON saa.id = djtam.app_system_id AND saa.app_module_id = djtam.app_module_id
AND djt.name LIKE concat('%',#{keyword},'%')

select djt.`id`, djt.`name`, djt.`is_active` as isActive, djt.`integration_uuid` as integrationUuid, djt.`config`, djt.`lcd`, djt.`lcu`, djtam.app_system_id as appSystemId, saa.abbr_name as appSystemAbbrName, saa.app_module_abbr_name as appModuleAbbrName, djtam.app_module_id as appModuleId from deploy_job_trigger djt left join deploy_job_trigger_app_module djtam on djt.id = djtam.trigger_id LEFT JOIN @{DATA_SCHEMA}.scence_appsystem_appmodule AS saa ON saa.id = djtam.app_system_id AND saa.app_module_id = djtam.app_module_id
djt.`id` in
#{id}
order by djt.`lcd` desc
